title: Chapter 1257 - The Solar Transformation Courtyard
body:
Chapter 1257 - The Solar Transformation Courtyard

The Immortal Court of Mount Penglai surely once had legacies and records of the Path of Transcendence.

But none remained.

Su Yi was finally starting to understand why the Illusionist went crazy after the Immortal-Burning Ruler was destroyed.

It was an unquestionably agonizing loss!

But although Su Yi found it a pity that an immortal weapon like the Immortal-Burning Ruler had been devoured by the Sword of the Nine Hells, he was already increasingly aware of how mysterious the sword’s origins were!

“They call it the Divine Kingdom of Illusions, but they’d be better off calling it the ruins of Penglai Immortal Island…”

Su Yi stood there and pondered for a while. He thought several things through, but he still had numerous doubts.

But he wasn’t in a rush.

The truth would ultimately become clear.

Su Yi then carried the crimson jade pendant into the ritual grounds. They were quite distinctive and full of mysteries. Each step carried him into an all-new heaven and earth. Su Yi calculated that it’d take sixty-four steps to cross.

In other words, the ritual grounds contained at least sixty-four illusions of ancient worlds.

Whoosh!
